title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Cardano (ADA) Jumps 13.6%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Litecoin (LTC) was also among the top performers, gaining 6.5% from Monday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3237.73, up 0.8% (+26.27) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Fifteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: ADA (+13.6%) and LTC (+6.5%).

Laggards: APT (-3.5%) and AAVE (-1.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is up 0.8% with 15 of 20 assets trading higher, led by significant gains in ADA (+13.6%) and LTC (+6.5%).
